website_summaries.verdict: You won't get any fancy features with this stick that's more practical for fun than serious play, but it's worth considering if a basic model is all you need.
pros: An affordable, versatile stick that can be used for ice or street hockey
Suitable for youths learning the basics of ice hockey
cons: Wooden build isn't as durable as most sticks made of other materials and occasionally develop splinters

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and fun!
customer_reviews.text: These hockey sticks were used to decorate a Happy Gilmore themed golf event and while I can't attest to the durability when actually playing hockey with them, they stood up to a lot of abuse from semi-inebriated golf tournament attendees. They were a hit with the people who stopped by our booth and lasted all day without a scratch. They are made of real wood and thick plastic and seem very durable and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Decent bargain to quality ratio
customer_reviews.text: This stick is a decent quality for the price. You have to mind the reasonable limitations of the stick and blade combo. It is only held together by two small screws. I found that for the most part if you use it for street hockey balls with no slapshot's you're probably fine. If you attempt to use it on a puck (green biscuit for instance) you will likely break the blade (pictured) and after a short amount of time the blade fastening will loosen up off of the stick and you will have to redrill or otherwise find another method of fastening the blade to the stick
customer_reviews.author: Nick H.

customer_reviews.title: Cheapest stick I could find
customer_reviews.text: I was searching for the cheapest stick that amazon would offer. This also happened to be their "amazon choice" stick. It feels pretty stable, its screwed in from opposing directions on the top and slightly lower top of where the plastic blade meets wood. Yet every so often, I feel something in it akin to a wobble. So I quickly examine the blade and always still seems to be firm? It remains a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Kostreba

customer_reviews.title: Good for beginners
customer_reviews.text: If you are someone who is just starting to get in to roller hockey, as I was and still kind of am, this is a great stick. It feels good in the hands, it has good control of the puck, and its pretty durable. The problems I began noticing as I became more familiar with hockey and used it more and more were it has very little flex, and the blade gets worn down quickly from dragging it on the ground because it is just ABS plastic. However, there are replacement blades made by MYLEC that are cheap and some are made out of composite material. Overall, if you are beginning to get into hockey, I would recommend this stick.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great Stick at a great price
customer_reviews.text: My son's play roller hockey on a concrete court and he outgrew his first stick that he used for two years. He is 52" and this stick is working prefect just like the smaller one that he got started with. Very durable and great for hitting street balls.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Got splinters taking it out of the box and so did my son as he grabbed for it. I remember buying these as a kid with the white blade for $10. Haven't used it cause I still need to sand it down.
customer_reviews.author: daniel carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Nice stick
customer_reviews.text: Good, solid stick. Glad the head is interchangeable because apparently everyone in my family plays left handed, so I'll be ordering new heads.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as it claimed and what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our box hockey game. Heavy, but good weight for our youth group. Seems sturdy and we'll made. Should last a long time
customer_reviews.author: Dena Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: Great stick. We are having lots of fun playing ...
customer_reviews.text: Great stick. We are having lots of fun playing around with these! Great quality and price.
customer_reviews.author: Mkelly

customer_reviews.title: Great Hockey Stick!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this hockey stick- it can really take a beating! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Treat Yoself

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised
customer_reviews.text: My kid is finally out of my hair. This stick has solved the “I need a new stick” problem. Great value and quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. Just what we needed for street hockey for 7-10!year olds
customer_reviews.author: M. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good stick for the money
customer_reviews.text: Use to play street hockey, good size for a guy 6 foot, I take some dirty slap shots with this stick off pavement and the stick holds up
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Hockey stick
customer_reviews.text: Great stick for street hockey... I played with Mylec airflows when I was 12-18yrs old (back in 1976-1982), they were great then too. I still have some of the sticks from back then and still use them with my kids. Back then they lasted longer, but this was a good buy and was fun to see that they still exist after all these years!
customer_reviews.author: Andreas Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Short stick for kids
customer_reviews.text: Sorry might be my misunderstanding but this stick is too short on roller blades. Other sticks say kids size and this one should too. Much better to cut a longer stick to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Burke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect condition & Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered something way too big because I didn't pay attention to the length of the product. However, it arrived in perfect condition, albeit in too huge of a box, but shipping was fast! Literally took 3 days from the time I ordered to the time it arrived at my door.
customer_reviews.author: Julieta Vyfhuis

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Stick
customer_reviews.text: High quality practice stick I absolutely love it. I suggest using sandpaper before using it barehanded.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, cheap price
customer_reviews.text: We use these for desk chair hockey and are very durable. Not very good with actual roller pucks, we use floor hockey pucks. Great for kids just getting into the game
customer_reviews.author: Chase Arbuckle

customer_reviews.title: Made it so easy to put #SticksOutForHumboldt
customer_reviews.text: Was glad to get this so fast to show Humboldt boys that we are all #HumboldtStrong
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Swartz

customer_reviews.title: Work great now.
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my granddaughters. The wood on stick was rough on hands but corrected with a few coats of clear cover. Work great now.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good street hockey stick.
customer_reviews.text: Our concrete is really rough. It stands up to the slap shots but the blade gets worn away but the kids play just about everyday. I like that the blades can be replaced and the stick doesn't have to be.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great starter stick!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect if you are just getting into hockey and want to learn how to use a stick. Also, it is surprisingly durable. I have ripped some big snapshots and it is like new.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan M

customer_reviews.title: Great size for me to play with my son's smaller ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size for me to play with my son's smaller set. Now I need him to stop his slap shots from destroying my shins.
customer_reviews.author: TacoTuesday

customer_reviews.title: Stick was great!
customer_reviews.text: Great stick for the price. Only warning is ask your kid about it before you buy! I did not know there were left sticks and right sticks and different flexes etc. Didn't work for me because I bought the wrong thing, but it looks great hanging on the wall as decoration ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Imslick

customer_reviews.title: Good Stick!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our youth group to replace our all plastic floor hockey set that fell apart quickly. These stick are by far better all around. The kids used them roughly at time and they hold up to the use. This is a great product for our money!
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Not for adults...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stick because it's affordable and had decent reviews. It however let me down in about 15 minutes when the shaft shattered half way up during a pick up game. The blade is thick and well constructed but the shaft is about as durable as a popsicle stick. If the entire thing were made of the same material as the blade then it'd be a good buy for games but I would only recommend this for children or shooting. Amazon did the right thing and refunded me without having to return it. I'll at least be able to transfer the blade to a different shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Okay stick
customer_reviews.text: This thing is tiny. Make sure you measure what you need.
customer_reviews.author: TMALL

customer_reviews.title: Great for Street Hockey
customer_reviews.text: Quality street hockey stick. Owned one as a child and here I am 25 years later buying one as an adult. Well made, durable, quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 9-yr-old son to replace a worn out stick with no blade replacement. He loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Scott B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good first stick and can handle the abuse you could think to throw at it.
customer_reviews.author: Zed

customer_reviews.title: Stick it
customer_reviews.text: My son is 9 and has shown interest in playing street hockey.He is right handed but plays better with his left.He loves the stick! When the stick hits the puck, it sounds like it's a real stick.
customer_reviews.author: CAD15

customer_reviews.title: Get your jam on!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for kids and adults, this model is slightly longer than a previous one we had and is perfect for larger kids and adults.
customer_reviews.author: J. Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This hockey stick is definitely worth the price and is an awesome street hockey stick!
customer_reviews.author: My Favorite Game!!!

customer_reviews.title: Street Hockey Stick
customer_reviews.text: The durabilty and toughness seem to be there but this stick leaves slivers all over my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Hard to find
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for my little lefty son, and the size combination was an ideal match that was very hard to find. He has used it a couple of times on the ice already, and so far, so great.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gaskins

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Quick deliver, great value, happy with purchase..got for kids so it's great that blades are easily replaceable
customer_reviews.author: Patnitup

customer_reviews.title: jet flows
customer_reviews.text: My Grandsons appear to like them and are having fun indoors with them. we will see how they holdup when we go outdoors in the spring.
customer_reviews.author: Martin M. Rudoff

customer_reviews.title: Delivered as promises
customer_reviews.text: It is a good value for the price and it was delivered as promised
customer_reviews.author: Aida Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm making three of these into a coat rack for my friend, who has been a hockey fan since he was a kid. They worked great, and because I'm drilling holes into them, I didnt want an expensive stick to ruin, so the price was perfect too.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: the removable blade of the stick is the highlight. ...
customer_reviews.text: the removable blade of the stick is the highlight. The handle is OK, but seems a bit rough to me.
customer_reviews.author: R. Korstange

customer_reviews.title: Great stick.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two, in different sizes, for playing hockey in the driveway. Item was solid and as expected...my son loves it!
customer_reviews.author: K. Capon

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my son for his birthday so he ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday so he could play street hockey. So far it's held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer L. Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it was a good price
customer_reviews.text: The wooden shaft rotted and broke. Now I have to replace it but I'll buy another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer#9847623

customer_reviews.title: Florida Street Hockey
customer_reviews.text: Good basic entry level street hockey stick. Works fine for that purpose. Durable, good quality wood with heavy duty plastic blade and fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: JeffJett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son plays hockey and it was the perfect stick for during the off season!
customer_reviews.author: Chisato Brittain

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for. My kids haven't used them too much yet, so I can't comment on durability.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: ... two hockey sticks for my Grandson's birthday and he loved them. Great product
customer_reviews.text: I bought two hockey sticks for my Grandson's birthday and he loved them. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Denyse R. Sternberg

customer_reviews.title: its good.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap stick, it works, but nothing special. For the price, its good.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with large chunks of wood missing from the handle.
customer_reviews.author: Sami R.

customer_reviews.title: pittodrie
customer_reviews.text: it does the job well!!!!i i have had fun with this in my yard,some of us never grow up!!!!thanx,try it
customer_reviews.author: Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Nice stick!
customer_reviews.text: Great stick. My son loves it. It is good quality

customer_reviews.title: Stick is flimsy. Feel vibrations in hand while hitting ...
customer_reviews.text: Stick is flimsy. Feel vibrations in hand while hitting the puck.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymos

customer_reviews.title: Good cheap stick
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids who just goof around. Its basic and cheap, but it does the job perfectly for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rob T.

customer_reviews.title: Stick functions as should. Left outside but covered for ...
customer_reviews.text: Stick functions as should. Left outside but covered for a month in the summer and the stick is splintering. Got a sliver. Moral of the story, store indoors.
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Our kids love them. They are very sturdy but light enough for our 6 year old to use.
customer_reviews.author: miami mom

customer_reviews.title: really good but not at the end
customer_reviews.text: It was good at first but then there was a slit in it and I said its fine but I took a shot and the little slit broke off the side of my stick.
customer_reviews.author: lion's don't bite

customer_reviews.title: Nice curve
customer_reviews.text: I like the the curve of the blade. It was just what I was expecting for a righty stick. With the curve like that, its easier for me to pick up the puck.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew David

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller that I expected, but it's a sturdy material. I'd buy from them again. :)
customer_reviews.author: Oldfashionednerd

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 13 yr old.  He plays with it all the time on the cement and it is sturdy enough to withstand it .
customer_reviews.text: My 13 yr old loves this. Perfect height for him.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hennings

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: This stick was a great deal. So far, it has held up well. Very pleased with this purchase. Would buy this again.

customer_reviews.title: great to play with the kids
customer_reviews.text: bought a starter hockey set for the hockey and what better to join the fun than to get a stick for myself, lol

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived perfectly crated to keep it from breaking or warping in transit. It is the perfect height for my husband.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great, my son loves it, especially the lefty stick :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lena R.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for good price
customer_reviews.text: It was a great buy for a low price. I'm very happy with it and would recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: carl

customer_reviews.title: This hockey stick has a wooden handle and a hard ...
customer_reviews.text: This hockey stick has a wooden handle and a hard plastic head. I whack stuff with it. Mostly pucks, but sometimes golf balls, soccer balls, and cats.
customer_reviews.author: David Dudley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! This should hold up well and no paint to peel off like the other sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof4

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Extrememly fast shipping, was here within 2 days. Is sturdy and very good for rough hockey play. All in all, the price was a bit hefty because I went to the store and saw the same stick for 15 bucks, when I payed 25, but that doesent bother me much. I give this a 5 star rating because of quality and excellent shipping. Way to go mylec!
customer_reviews.author: Laik Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed a left-handed hockey stick. And it's by Mylec, so you know the quality is there.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS FOR MYSELF SO I CAN PLAY WITH MY 7YROLD SON. I GUESS IT DOES ITS JOB. BUT IT FEELS A LITTLE WEAK. BUT WHO AM I TO SAY. I DONT PLAY HOCKEY IM A MOM WHO REALLY COOKS INSTEAD.
customer_reviews.author: BS:)

customer_reviews.title: Not to be left outside
customer_reviews.text: These work fine, but be aware that if you leave them outside at all, they start to splinter. I have to constantly sand them because my kids were coming in with tiny splinters in their hands.
customer_reviews.author: BHX

customer_reviews.title: Great for young street hockey player
customer_reviews.text: This made a great gift for my nephew. Low cost but reliable stick. It was easy to cut the length down to the right size and tape the end. You can also buy a cap if you're not sure how to tape a hockey stick. The plastic wears really well so he will get quite a long use out of it
customer_reviews.author: gustavo dalanhese

customer_reviews.title: Too short, not good in warm weather
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty disappointed in this stick. The blade turns to rubber when it's hot outside, so don't expect to use this for street hockey during the summertime. Also, the blade was pretty loosely secured to the shaft. Finally, I'm 6'2", and I found this stick to be about 2" too short for me. I'm hanging on to it for when winter comes around, but I doubt I'll like it much better then.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Nasium

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the price. Bought for an 8 year of street hockey player.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Hockey Stick
customer_reviews.text: My kids love these. I'm pretty sure I have the next Wayne Gretzky on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: BuckeyeBrewer

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it. Trying to figure out if I should ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this broke the first day we used it. I think it may have been defective. The stick broke in half and it wasn't even being misused. I wanted to like it. Trying to figure out if I should risk rebuying.
customer_reviews.author: blessedtobemom

customer_reviews.title: mylec makes good street hockey sticks for kids
customer_reviews.text: Quality as expected, mylec makes good street hockey sticks for kids. The lenght of the stick is a little short for an adult. Good value
customer_reviews.author: John and Judy

customer_reviews.title: Great sticks for the price
customer_reviews.text: Even better than I expected for the price. Exactly what I wanted for my kids and I to play street hockey.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Cathey

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Stick
customer_reviews.text: High quality hockey stick. My kids have used them for almost a year now and they have held up well!
customer_reviews.author: Ned Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and awesome. Thanks (^_^) Good fit length to my height.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Lin

customer_reviews.title: Great street hockey stick for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great hockey stick for my sons. I bought one for each of them (ages 7 and 9). Feels really solid and there's little to no flex on the blade. Definitely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Very great stick! I used it already and it shows no sign of letting me down anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: These hockey sticks are great! I wasn't sure about the quality, but it is way better than I thought! My kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Loucks

customer_reviews.title: Should be a five dollar stick hugely disappointed me like
customer_reviews.text: Should be a five dollar stick hugely disappointed me like crap
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Weirdest golf club I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: This is one goofy golf club. I had a lot of trouble getting any altitude off the tee, and everybody was looking at me kinda weird. For the price, I thought I was getting a good deal on a sweet retro driver, but all I got was a nice old school hockey stick that has the perfect blade curve to launch street hockey balls into my son's face. After apologizing and cleaning the mess up, I went back to launching lasers into the net and denting the garage door. That's ok because it's my door, and I forgive myself. I'm too old, and can't skate, so Crosby's job is safe.
customer_reviews.author: The King of Nothing

customer_reviews.title: Plastic head broke after 2 days. They sent a ...
customer_reviews.text: Plastic head broke after 2 days. They sent a lefty and I'm righty. That may have been my over site but obviously didn't specify it clearly. I was trying to bend it to make it a righty stick and it snapped. I had to go to Dick's Sporting Goods to get a replacement head.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Capizola Jr.

product_meta.title: Mylec Eclipse Jet Flo Stick
product_meta.description: 53" Eclipse Jet Flo Hockey Stick features patented Jet Flo Blade. 2 Piece design with 2 screws for a secure fit.
feature_bullets: Two piece design with 2 screws for a secure fit.
